mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clients (ssn, name, email, password, phone_number, address, role, created_at, profile_image_url, email_verified) VALUES (#{ssn}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, #{role}, #{createdAt}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{emailVerified})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM clients WHERE REPLACE(ssn, '-', '') = REPLACE(#{ssn}, '-', '')
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM clients WHERE REPLACE(phone_number, '-', '') = REPLACE(#{phoneNumber}, '-', '')
